name: Vercel AI SDK
info: The AI SDK is the TypeScript toolkit designed to help developers build AI-powered applications with React, Next.js, Vue, Svelte, Node.js, and more.

name: LangChain
info: LangChain is a framework designed to make it easier to develop applications with large language models (LLMs). It offers a standard interface for creating chains of different modules like prompts, memory, and models, facilitating complex application building.

name: AutoGen
info: AutoGen is a framework that enables the development of LLM applications using multiple agents that can converse with each other to solve tasks. AutoGen agents are customizable, conversable, and seamlessly allow human participation.

name: Haystack
info: Haystack is an open-source NLP framework to interact with your data using Transformer models and LLMs (GPT-4, ChatGPT, etc.). It enables quick and easy construction of reliable question-answering, semantic search, text generation, and summarization systems for a wide range of applications.

name: Genkit
info: Genkit is an open-source platform that simplifies the development of production-ready applications powered by large language models (LLMs). It offers tools for various tasks such as generating text, summarizing documents, and more.

name: Promptflow
info: Promptflow is a development tool designed for creating and evaluating prompt flows. It provides a user-friendly interface for constructing complex workflows that utilize large language models (LLMs) and allows for easy testing and optimization of these flows.

Atomic Agents is a framework for building AI-powered applications that use large language models (LLMs) to interact with users. It provides a set of tools for creating conversational agents that can perform a wide range of tasks, from answering questions to generating text.
name: atomic-agents
Llama-Index
info: LlamaIndex is a data framework for LLM-based applications to ingest, structure, and access private or domain-specific data.

name: NeMo
info: NeMo is a conversational AI toolkit built for researchers working on automatic speech recognition (ASR), natural language processing (NLP), and text-to-speech synthesis (TTS).

name: OpenPrompt
info: OpenPrompt is an open-source framework for prompt-learning. It provides a standard, flexible and extensible framework to deploy the prompt-learning pipeline.

name: PromptLayer
info: PromptLayer acts as a layer between your code and OpenAI's Python library. It records all your OpenAI API requests, allowing you to search and explore request history in the PromptLayer dashboard.

name: Rasa
info: Rasa is an open-source machine learning framework to automate text-and voice-based conversations.

name: Botpress
info: Botpress is a platform to build, deploy and manage AI-powered chatbots.

name: Humanloop
info: Humanloop is a platform for improving the performance of natural language models through human feedback and reinforcement learning.

name: Promptable
info: Promptable provides tools and infrastructure for building and managing large language model (LLM) applications. It focuses on simplifying the development process and providing robust features for deploying and maintaining these applications.

name: Langroid
info: Langroid is a Python framework to easily set up LLM (Large Language Model)-powered applications by allowing a user to express the problem declaratively, without worrying about low-level implementation details.

name: aiconfig
info: AIConfig is a framework for building AI-powered applications that decouples AI model interaction logic, such as prompts and parameters, from the application code. It allows developers to manage and version these interactions independently of their application.
